title: gzserver crashes when launched with ssh X-forwarding

content.raw:
gzserver crashes under xforwarding. 

I'm using close to master of gazebo. 

It appears its failing on finding software rastering drivers. 

```
$ ssh -XC -i /tmp/cloudsim.pem ubuntu@54.153.117.21
Welcome to Ubuntu 16.04.1 LTS (GNU/Linux 4.4.0-47-generic x86_64)

 * Documentation:  https://help.ubuntu.com
 * Management:     https://landscape.canonical.com
 * Support:        https://ubuntu.com/advantage

  Get cloud support with Ubuntu Advantage Cloud Guest:
    http://www.ubuntu.com/business/services/cloud

0 packages can be updated.
0 updates are security updates.


*** System restart required ***
Last login: Wed Nov 30 21:23:11 2016 from 70.35.50.58
ubuntu@ip-172-31-4-117:~$ export INSTALL_SPACE=/opt/sasc
ubuntu@ip-172-31-4-117:~$ . ${INSTALL_SPACE}/setup.bash
ubuntu@ip-172-31-4-117:~$ . ${INSTALL_SPACE}/share/gazebo-8/setup.sh
ubuntu@ip-172-31-4-117:~$ roslaunch gazebo_ros empty_world.launch
... logging to /home/ubuntu/.ros/log/6a60ce9c-b743-11e6-a109-06a6f23610ae/roslaunch-ip-172-31-4-117-9560.log
Checking log directory for disk usage. This may take awhile.
Press Ctrl-C to interrupt
Done checking log file disk usage. Usage is <1GB.

started roslaunch server http://ip-172-31-4-117:37043/

SUMMARY
========

PARAMETERS
 * /rosdistro: kinetic
 * /rosversion: 1.12.6
 * /use_sim_time: True

NODES
  /
    gazebo (gazebo_ros/gzserver)
    gazebo_gui (gazebo_ros/gzclient)

auto-starting new master
process[master]: started with pid [9571]
ROS_MASTER_URI=http://localhost:11311

setting /run_id to 6a60ce9c-b743-11e6-a109-06a6f23610ae
process[rosout-1]: started with pid [9584]
started core service [/rosout]
process[gazebo-2]: started with pid [9588]
process[gazebo_gui-3]: started with pid [9594]
[ INFO] [1480541086.883545796]: Finished loading Gazebo ROS API Plugin.
[ INFO] [1480541086.884134560]: waitForService: Service [/gazebo/set_physics_properties] has not been advertised, waiting...
libGL error: No matching fbConfigs or visuals found
libGL error: failed to load driver: swrast
X Error of failed request:  BadValue (integer parameter out of range for operation)
  Major opcode of failed request:  154 (GLX)
  Minor opcode of failed request:  3 (X_GLXCreateContext)
  Value in failed request:  0x0
  Serial number of failed request:  30
  Current serial number in output stream:  31
gzserver: /usr/include/boost/thread/pthread/recursive_mutex.hpp:113: void boost::recursive_mutex::lock(): Assertion `!pthread_mutex_lock(&m)' failed.
Aborted (core dumped)
[gazebo-2] process has died [pid 9588, exit code 134, cmd /opt/sasc/lib/gazebo_ros/gzserver -e ode worlds/empty.world __name:=gazebo __log:=/home/ubuntu/.ros/log/6a60ce9c-b743-11e6-a109-06a6f23610ae/gazebo-2.log].
log file: /home/ubuntu/.ros/log/6a60ce9c-b743-11e6-a109-06a6f23610ae/gazebo-2*.log
^C[gazebo_gui-3] killing on exit
[rosout-1] killing on exit
[master] killing on exit
shutting down processing monitor...
... shutting down processing monitor complete
done
```


Full output of running it with X forwarding and without: 
```
tfoote@snowman:~ Last: [255] (31334s Seconds)
$ ssh -XC -i /tmp/cloudsim.pem ubuntu@54.153.117.21
Welcome to Ubuntu 16.04.1 LTS (GNU/Linux 4.4.0-47-generic x86_64)

 * Documentation:  https://help.ubuntu.com
 * Management:     https://landscape.canonical.com
 * Support:        https://ubuntu.com/advantage

  Get cloud support with Ubuntu Advantage Cloud Guest:
    http://www.ubuntu.com/business/services/cloud

0 packages can be updated.
0 updates are security updates.


*** System restart required ***
Last login: Wed Nov 30 10:15:51 2016 from 73.252.160.81
ubuntu@ip-172-31-4-117:~$ export INSTALL_SPACE=/opt/sasc
ubuntu@ip-172-31-4-117:~$ . ${INSTALL_SPACE}/setup.bash
ubuntu@ip-172-31-4-117:~$ . ${INSTALL_SPACE}/share/gazebo-8/setup.sh
ubuntu@ip-172-31-4-117:~$ . ${INSTALL_SPACE}/share/uctf/setup.sh
ubuntu@ip-172-31-4-117:~$ export GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH=$GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH:${INSTALL_SPACE}/share/gazebo_models
ubuntu@ip-172-31-4-117:~$ export ROS_HOSTNAME=192.168.2.1
ubuntu@ip-172-31-4-117:~$ export ROS_MASTER_URI=http://192.168.2.1:11311
ubuntu@ip-172-31-4-117:~$ roslaunch uctf uctf.launch gui:=false
... logging to /home/ubuntu/.ros/log/7f7572de-b742-11e6-a109-06a6f23610ae/roslaunch-ip-172-31-4-117-8653.log
Checking log directory for disk usage. This may take awhile.
Press Ctrl-C to interrupt
Done checking log file disk usage. Usage is <1GB.

started roslaunch server http://192.168.2.1:36602/

SUMMARY
========

PARAMETERS
 * /rosdistro: kinetic
 * /rosversion: 1.12.6
 * /use_sim_time: True

NODES
  /
    gazebo (gazebo_ros/gzserver)

auto-starting new master
process[master]: started with pid [8664]
ROS_MASTER_URI=http://192.168.2.1:11311

setting /run_id to 7f7572de-b742-11e6-a109-06a6f23610ae
process[rosout-1]: started with pid [8677]
started core service [/rosout]
process[gazebo-2]: started with pid [8681]
[ INFO] [1480540692.196119605]: Finished loading Gazebo ROS API Plugin.
[ INFO] [1480540692.197356873]: waitForService: Service [/gazebo/set_physics_properties] has not been advertised, waiting...
libGL error: No matching fbConfigs or visuals found
libGL error: failed to load driver: swrast
X Error of failed request:  BadValue (integer parameter out of range for operation)
  Major opcode of failed request:  154 (GLX)
  Minor opcode of failed request:  3 (X_GLXCreateContext)
  Value in failed request:  0x0
  Serial number of failed request:  30
  Current serial number in output stream:  31
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'boost::exception_detail::clone_impl<boost::exception_detail::error_info_injector<boost::lock_error> >'
  what():  boost: mutex lock failed in pthread_mutex_lock: Invalid argument
Aborted (core dumped)
[gazebo-2] process has died [pid 8681, exit code 134, cmd /opt/sasc/lib/gazebo_ros/gzserver -e ode /opt/sasc/share/uctf/worlds/uctf.world __name:=gazebo __log:=/home/ubuntu/.ros/log/7f7572de-b742-11e6-a109-06a6f23610ae/gazebo-2.log].
log file: /home/ubuntu/.ros/log/7f7572de-b742-11e6-a109-06a6f23610ae/gazebo-2*.log
^C[rosout-1] killing on exit
[master] killing on exit
shutting down processing monitor...
... shutting down processing monitor complete
done
ubuntu@ip-172-31-4-117:~$ logout
Connection to 54.153.117.21 closed.
tfoote@snowman:~ Last: [0] (55s Seconds)
$ ssh -i /tmp/cloudsim.pem ubuntu@54.153.117.21
Welcome to Ubuntu 16.04.1 LTS (GNU/Linux 4.4.0-47-generic x86_64)

 * Documentation:  https://help.ubuntu.com
 * Management:     https://landscape.canonical.com
 * Support:        https://ubuntu.com/advantage

  Get cloud support with Ubuntu Advantage Cloud Guest:
    http://www.ubuntu.com/business/services/cloud

0 packages can be updated.
0 updates are security updates.


*** System restart required ***
Last login: Wed Nov 30 21:17:27 2016 from 70.35.50.58
ubuntu@ip-172-31-4-117:~$ export INSTALL_SPACE=/opt/sasc
ubuntu@ip-172-31-4-117:~$ . ${INSTALL_SPACE}/setup.bash
ubuntu@ip-172-31-4-117:~$ . ${INSTALL_SPACE}/share/gazebo-8/setup.sh
```

I'm using close to master of gazebo.

It appears its failing on finding software rastering drivers.
